scripts.install: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false && NODE_ENV=production npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
